QuestData.Title: Cut the Roots
QuestData.Description: It's just as I feared, friend. The entire village is turned, just like Lavrash.$b$bLewor would have transformed the other elders as soon as possible. They are all strong in their own right. Brave Fiona, clever Bitterfly....$b$bIt pains me to say this, but they must be destroyed. For the good of Ardenweald and the forest, slay our former leaders before they can infect the rest of the land!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Bitterfly, Fiona Bleakthorn, and Wildtwister Lewor.
